column4: hello, please i need your help, suddenly i get "error: no such partition
how can it be, yesterday i used normally my ubuntu 11.10
no, it was my first thought, but no :(
if i write ls, then i get only hd with msdos
you have a live cd handy?
so this is now a new install that seems to have a failed grub
depends on how you did the install.
i didn't install it, i did everything til the step, where to chose the disk
see what partitions and disks  'sudo fdisk -l' show from the live cd.
you may want to pastebin the output of 'sudo fdisk -l' for the channel to see.  Was there anything on you rlinux install you wanted to recover?
i would like to know how could it happen, that my ubuntu installation just gone
http://pastebin.com/r19BcKEc can you take a look please?
